text: She narrowly avoided entering the vow renewals of Madonna's manager Guy Oseary and his model wife Michelle at the same time as her ex Ashton Kutcher. But Demi Moore led the pack of actors and musicians spotted heading to the couple's'wedding feast'in Rio de Janeiro, gliding effortlessly through the event without a care. Joined by the likes of Chris Rock, Dakota Johnson, David Arquette, Owen Wilson, Anthony Keidis, Flea and many others, Demi, 54, looked lovely in a floaty light blue patterned frock with long sleeves. Brazilian blowout : Demi Moore steps out in a floaty pastel dress as she attends star - filled evening reception for Guy Oseary's vow renewals... after narrowly avoiding run - in with ex
